title: Luxury Gold Facial
shortDescription: Indulge in the ultimate luxury with our Gold Facial, designed to rejuvenate and enhance your skin's natural radiance.
longDescription:
1. Antioxidant Protection
  2. Anti-Inflammatory Effects
  3. Improved Blood Circulation
  4. Radiant and Glowing Skin
  5. Hydration and Moisture Retention
  6. Reduction of Fine Lines and Wrinkles
  7. Luxurious and Relaxing Experience
  8. Enhanced Product Absorption
steps:
1. Cleansing: Thoroughly clean the skin to remove impurities.
  2. Exfoliation: Gently exfoliate to prepare the skin for gold infusion.
  3. Gold Mask Application: Apply a luxurious gold-infused mask for antioxidant benefits.
  4. Massage: Enjoy a relaxing facial massage to enhance blood circulation.
  5. Moisturization: Hydrate the skin with a high-quality moisturizer containing gold elements.
  6. Final Touch: Conclude the treatment with a protective sunscreen.

title: Thai Back Massage
shortDescription: Experience the therapeutic benefits of traditional Thai massage focused on the back to release tension and improve overall well-being.
longDescription:
Our Thai Back Massage incorporates ancient Thai massage techniques, including:

  • Stretching: Gentle stretching movements to improve flexibility.
  • Acupressure: Targeted pressure on specific points to release tension.
  • Sen Lines: Following the body's energy pathways for balance and harmony.

Indulge in this rejuvenating experience for a holistic approach to relaxation.
steps:
1. Welcome: Arrive and relax in our tranquil spa environment.
  2. Consultation: Discuss your preferences and any specific areas of concern with our skilled massage therapist.
  3. Thai Back Massage: Enjoy the therapeutic benefits of the Thai Back Massage, combining stretching, acupressure, and Sen line techniques.
  4. Aromatherapy (Optional): Enhance your experience with the calming scents of Thai-inspired essential oils.
  5. Post-Massage Relaxation: Take your time to relax and rejuvenate before concluding your session.
